statements: SELECT * FROM network_traffic_monitor WHERE threat_level = 'high';
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_monitor WHERE protocol = 'TCP' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, port, protocol FROM network_traffic_monitor WHERE threat_level = 'medium' AND port BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY source_ip ASC, port ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT destination_ip FROM network_traffic_monitor WHERE protocol = 'UDP';
SELECT id, threat_level, timestamp FROM network_traffic_monitor WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_monitor WHERE threat_level = 'high' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, port FROM network_traffic_monitor WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY destination_ip
SELECT DISTINCT port FROM network_traffic_monitor WHERE protocol = 'TCP' AND threat_level = 'medium'
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_monitor WHERE threat_level IN ('low', 'medium')
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS count FROM network_traffic_monitor GROUP BY source_ip HAVING count > 1 ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT * FROM network_traffic;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT avg(threat_level) AS average_threat_level FROM threat_alerts;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic WHERE source_ip = '192.168.0.1';
SELECT destination_ip, COUNT(*) AS num_alerts FROM network_traffic JOIN threat_alerts ON network_traffic.id = threat_alerts.alert_id GROUP BY destination_ip;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic WHERE protocol = 'HTTPS' ORDER BY destination_ip DESC;
SELECT id, source_ip FROM network_traffic WHERE source_ip LIKE '%.1%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT destination_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM network_traffic GROUP BY destination_ip HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, alert_type FROM network_traffic JOIN threat_alerts ON network_traffic.id = threat_alerts.alert_id WHERE threat_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM threat_alerts ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic WHERE protocol = 'HTTP'
SELECT id, threat_level, source_ip FROM network_traffic ORDER BY threat_level DESC
SELECT destination_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM network_traffic GROUP BY destination_ip HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT st.id, st.signature_text, ts.created_at FROM threat_signature st INNER JOIN threat_signature ts ON st.id = ts.id
SELECT sa.id, sa.name, sa.email FROM security_analyst sa WHERE sa.department = 'IT'
SELECT * FROM network_traffic WHERE threat_level = 3;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic WHERE threat_level > 1 ORDER BY source_ip ASC;
SELECT * FROM threat_signature WHERE threat_level >= 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, name, department FROM security_analyst WHERE department = 'Security' AND name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, threat_level FROM network_traffic WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' AND threat_level < 3 ORDER BY threat_level ASC, source_ip DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT threat_type, severity_level, description FROM threat_classification WHERE severity_level='High';
SELECT id, name, email FROM security_analysts WHERE department='IT';
SELECT alert_type, alert_message, timestamp FROM alert_logs WHERE analyst_id=1 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic WHERE data_size > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND data_size < 5000;
SELECT * FROM threat_classification WHERE severity_level = 'High' OR threat_type = 'Malware' ORDER BY threat_type ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM security_analysts WHERE department = 'IT Security' AND name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT alert_type, alert_message, timestamp FROM alert_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-02-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-03-01 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'Data Center';
SELECT threat_type, threat_level, threat_description FROM threat_detection WHERE threat_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM security_analysts WHERE experience_years >= 5 ORDER BY analyst_name DESC;
SELECT analyst_name, department FROM security_analysts WHERE location = 'HQ' ORDER BY analyst_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT log_timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' AND status = 'Successful' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT analyst_name, department, experience_years FROM security_analysts WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT t.threat_type, t.threat_level, a.analyst_name, a.department FROM threat_detection t JOIN security_analysts a ON t.threat_id = a.analyst_id;
